definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: The Industrial Revolution began with such machines; the millwrights were the engineers of the coming age.
sentences.chinese: 修造磨坊的匠人就是开创新时代的工程师。

sentences.english: Build a quarry and then a stonemason.
What's changed me about them is another bow build I saw.
sentences.chinese: 改变什么我关于他们是另一弓修造我锯。

sentences.english: It took a hundred thousand men more than twenty years to build the Great Pyramid.
sentences.chinese: 大金字塔是由十多万人修造了二十余年才建成的。

sentences.english: After them repaired Zadok the son of Immer over against his house.
sentences.chinese: 其次是音麦的儿子，撒督对着自己的房屋修造。

sentences.english: But each survival artist builds the wall.
sentences.chinese: 但各位生存艺术家修造墙壁。

sentences.english: If the regulars left the game with a lead, the reserves maintained or built upon it.
sentences.chinese: 如果正规兵留给比赛领先，储备维护了或修造了在它。

sentences.english: And next unto them repaired Zadok the son of Baana.
sentences.chinese: 其次是巴拿的儿子撒督修造。

sentences.english: How do we build our inner man ?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎么修造我们的内在人？

sentences.english: After him Pedaiah the son of Parosh.
sentences.chinese: 其次是巴录的儿子毗大雅修造。

sentences.english: Next unto him repaired Uzziel the son of Harhaiah, of the goldsmiths.
sentences.chinese: 其次是银匠哈海雅的儿子乌薛修造。

sentences.english: It was also built with all divisions, also known as build.
sentences.chinese: 另外还设有修造都师，又称修造。

sentences.english: It was also built with all divisions, also known as build.
sentences.chinese: 另外还设有修造都师，又称修造。

sentences.english: And between the going up of the corner unto the sheep gate repaired the goldsmiths and the merchants.
sentences.chinese: 银匠与商人在城的角楼，和羊门中间修造。

sentences.english: From above the horse gate repaired the priests, every one over against his house.
sentences.chinese: 从马门往上，众祭司各对自己的房屋修造。

sentences.english: I made gardens and parks and planted all kinds of fruit trees in them.
sentences.chinese: 修造园囿，在其中栽种各样果木树。

definition: to carry out large scale construction
to break ground (prior to building sth)/to start building
Zaoqiao or Tsaochiao township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
to supervise and construct/constructed under the supervision of
to cut (a canal, tunnel, well etc)
to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
